hugo 使用 安装 # 源代码安装 go get -u -v github.com/spf13/hugo # 包安装 https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases hugo version 生成站点 hugo new site /path/to/site hugo new site blog.01cs.cc 创建 themes 目录 cd /path/to/site git init # doc 模板 git clone https://github.com/matcornic/hugo-theme-learn.git git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml git submodule add https://github.com/spf13/hyde.git themes/hyde echo 'theme =
